timeline.description_en: Micro architecture: internal design of components, technologies, etc.

timeline.description_de: 3. Passe die organisatorische Struktur an Projektgröße, Kontext und Kultur an
timeline.description_en: 3. Match your organizational setup to project size, context, and culture

timeline.description_de: 4. Hab keine Angst, Dinge zentral zu entscheiden
timeline.description_en: 4. Don't be afraid to decide things centrally

timeline.description_en: Suggestions for what should be decided centrally

timeline.description_en: 10. Be boring and do more with less

quotes.text: Be aware of your perspectives and act accordingly.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov

quotes.text: Focus innovation on the domain, not technology.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov

quotes.text: Architecture is the important stuff—the stuff that's hard, that's easy to get wrong with incredibly negative side effects.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov

quotes.text: Don't aim for perfection—rather aim for evolvability.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov

quotes.text: If you try to do everything at once, you'll fail.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov

quotes.text: Enforce the least viable amount of rules, but enforce them rigidly.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov

quotes.text: The point of a perspective is to put one thing in your laser-sharp focus.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov

quotes.text: Make decisions, and encourage others to make them too—even if it's hard.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov

quotes.text: Don't be the ChatGPT of architecture.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov

quotes.text: Every time you pick some solution from one context and apply it to a different one without considering whether it’s a match, you’re going to end up with a mess.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov

quotes.text: Architecture is an ongoing thing—it's not something you hand off to developers and walk away.
quotes.author: Stefan Tilkov
